message: "She says a big focus now is on bringing forward felony charges for pimps instead of going after misdemeanor prostitution charges for people who are likely victims."

data.description: ALAMANCE COUNTY, N.C. -- From Burlington to Greensboro, we’re seeing arrests for human trafficking and sex enslavement. Serious charges for crimes law enforcement say could happen hundreds of times a day. It’s not unique to one city or even one region, but across the Piedmont, law enforcement is...
data.title: Law enforcement steps up efforts to end human trafficking in the Piedmont
